title: St. Vincent
description: A young boy whose parents have just divorced finds an unlikely friend and mentor in the misanthropic, bawdy, hedonistic war veteran who lives next door.

title: Rise of the Guardians
description: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

title: The Parent Trap
description: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

title: Sleeping Beauty
description: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: Glory Road

title: The Fox and the Hound

title: The Ghost

title: Go

title: The Witcher: Nightmare of the Wolf

description: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

title: The Beguiled
description: While recuperating in a Confederate girls' boarding school, a Union soldier cons his way into each of the lonely women's hearts, causing them to turn on each other, and eventually, on him.

title: Wish Dragon
description: Determined teen Din is longing to reconnect with his childhood best friend when he meets a wish-granting dragon who shows him the magic of possibilities.

title: Django
description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

title: The Madness of King George
description: When King George III goes mad, his Lieutenants try to adjust the rules to run the country without his participation.

title: Re-Animator
description: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

title: Honey Boy
description: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health.

title: Quills
description: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

title: The Light Between Oceans
description: A lighthouse keeper and his wife living off the coast of Western Australia raise a baby they rescue from a drifting rowing boat.

title: Pay It Forward
description: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

title: The Dead Zone
description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.

title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
description: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

title: Vanishing Point
description: During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.

title: Speak
description: After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.

title: Stuck in Love.
description: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.

title: An American Crime
description: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.

title: About Schmidt
description: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.
In 1971, a young and disoriented British soldier is accidentally abandoned by his unit following a riot on the deadly streets of Belfast.

title: Candy
description: A poet falls in love with an art student who gravitates to his bohemian lifestyle -- and his love of heroin. Hooked as much on one another as they are on the drug, their relationship alternates between states of oblivion, self-destruction, and despair.

title: The Hitcher
description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

title: Runaway Train
description: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a speeding train with no brakes and nobody driving.

title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
description: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor, Professor G.H. Hardy.

title: The Misfits
description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

title: The Hudsucker Proxy
description: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

title: Sleep Tight
description: You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?

title: The Changeling
description: After the death of his wife and daughter in a car crash, a music professor staying at a long-vacant Seattle mansion is dragged into a decades-old mystery by an inexplicable presence in the mansion's attic.

title: Fahrenheit 451
description: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

title: Hard Eight
description: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

title: Arlington Road
description: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

title: Strictly Ballroom
description: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

title: The Young Victoria
description: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

title: The Siege of Jadotville
description: Irish Commandant Pat Quinlan leads a stand off with troops against French and Belgian Mercenaries in the Congo during the early 1960s.

title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
description: After escaping from an insane asylum, the bonkers Charles Dreyfus sends 26 assassins on the trail of the forever bumbling Inspector Clouseau.

title: Ring
description: A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.

title: Broken Flowers
description: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

title: Way of the Dragon
description: A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.

title: Magnum Force
description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

title: Mongol: The Rise to Power of Genghis Khan
description: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world in 1206.

title: Pump Up the Volume
description: Mark runs a pirate radio station and causes an uproar when he speaks his mind and enthralls fellow teens.

title: The Sessions
description: A man in an iron lung who wishes to lose his virginity contacts a professional sex surrogate with the help of his therapist and priest.

title: The End of the Tour

title: Along With the Gods: The Two Worlds
description: After a heroic death, a firefighter navigates the afterlife with the help of three guides.

title: El Topo
description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

title: A Mighty Wind
description: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

title: The Andromeda Strain
description: A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.

title: Secretariat
description: Penny Chenery Tweedy and colleagues guide her long-shot but precocious stallion to set, in 1973, the unbeaten record for winning the Triple Crown.

title: Beginners
description: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

title: The Great Race
description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

title: An American in Paris
description: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

title: Nothing But the Truth
description: In Washington, D.C., a reporter faces a possible jail sentence for outing a CIA agent and refusing to reveal her source.

title: In the Valley of Elah
description: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

title: State of Grace
description: A New York cop is recruited to return to his hometown and infiltrate the mob ran by his best friend's brother.

title: Them!
description: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

title: Wonder Boys
description: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

title: Kon-Tiki
description: Legendary explorer Thor Heyerdahl's epic 4,300-mile crossing of the Pacific on a balsawood raft in 1947, in an effort to prove that it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.

title: Memoir of a Murderer
description: A former serial killer with Alzheimer's fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
description: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

title: Paris, je t'aime
description: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented, and awakened.

title: A Soldier's Story
description: An African-American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

title: Harry Brown
description: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.

title: An Officer and a Spy
description: In 1894, French Captain Alfred Dreyfus is wrongfully convicted of treason and sentenced to life imprisonment at Devil's island.

title: Anomalisa
description: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

title: The Wife
description: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm to see her husband receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.

title: Armour of God II: Operation Condor
description: Jackie is hired to help the UN find Nazi gold hidden in Sahara. He's accompanied from Spain by 2 (later 3) cute women. As there are others wanting the gold, lots of kung fu fighting and comedy follows.

title: Shattered Glass
description: The story of a young journalist who fell from grace when it was discovered he fabricated over half of his articles from the publication The New Republic magazine.

description: Held hostage by the powerful Falcone crime family, Gotham City is rife with crime and corruption. Adding to the chaos is the mysterious Holiday killer, who has been targeting the underworld and leaving a trail of terror - and body bags.

title: Black Box
description: A young and talented black box analyst is on a mission to solve the reason behind the deadly crash of a brand new aircraft.

title: Broadcast News
description: Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.

title: The Transformers: The Movie
description: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
description: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

title: Manderlay
description: A story of slavery, set in the southern U.S. in the 1930s.

title: Fist of Fury
description: A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.

title: Bajirao Mastani
description: An account of the romance between the Maratha general, Baji Rao I and Mastani, princess of Bundelkhand.

title: Breakfast on Pluto
description: In the 1970s, a young trans woman, Patrick "Kitten" Braden, comes of age by leaving her Irish town for London, in part to look for her mother and in part because her gender identity is beyond the town's understanding.

title: Quadrophenia
description: Jimmy loathes his job and parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding, and drugs, only to be disappointed.

title: Arizona Dream
description: A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.

title: The Tale
description: A woman filming a documentary on childhood rape victims starts to question the nature of her childhood relationship with her riding instructor and running coach.

title: Peaceful Warrior
description: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

title: Children of a Lesser God
description: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

title: Private Life
description: An author is undergoing multiple fertility therapies to get pregnant, putting her relationship with her husband on edge.

title: Babyteeth
description: Milla, a seriously ill teenager, falls in love with a drug dealer, Moses, her parents' worst nightmare.

title: Angst
description: A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.

title: Dracula
description: Jonathan Harker rouses the ire of Count Dracula after he accepts a job at the vampire's castle under false pretenses. Harker's friend, Dr. Van Helsing, then embarks on a hunt for the predatory villain when he targets Harker's loved ones.

title: Utoya - July 22
description: A teenage girl struggles to survive and to find her younger sister during the July 2011 terrorist mass murder at a political summer camp on the Norwegian island of Utøya.

title: In Your Name
description: Problems arise when Radhey Mohan, a delinquent falls in love with a girl named Nirjara.

title: Department Q: The Keeper of Lost Causes
description: Police inspector Carl Mørck is put in charge of a department of cold cases, joined only by his assistant Assad. They dig into a case about a missing woman.

title: House of Games
description: A psychiatrist comes to the aid of a compulsive gambler and is led by a smooth-talking grifter into the shadowy but compelling world of stings, scams, and con men.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
description: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by officer Fletcher Christian.

title: The Physician
description: In 11th-century Persia, a surgeon's apprentice disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

title: Stan & Ollie
description: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song: a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.

title: Animal Farm
description: A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.

title: Cactus Flower
description: A dentist pretends to be married to avoid commitment, but when he falls for his girlfriend and proposes, he must recruit his lovelorn nurse to pose as his wife.

title: The Woodsman
description: A child molester returns to his hometown after 12 years in prison and attempts to start a new life.

title: Cat People
description: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.

title: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

title: Gunfight at The O.K Corral
description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

title: Mom
description: After her daughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.

title: The Cincinnati Kid
description: An up-and-coming poker player tries to prove himself in a high-stakes match against a long-time master of the game.

title: The Express
description: A drama based on the life of college football hero Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy.

title: Calamity Jane
description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: Testament of Youth
description: A British woman recalls coming of age during World War I - a story of young love, the futility of war, and how to make sense of the darkest times.

title: Brassed Off
description: The coal mine in a northern English village may be closing, which would also mean the end of the miners' brass band.

title: Defending Your Life
description: In an afterlife way-station resembling a major city, the lives of the recently deceased are examined in a court-like setting.

title: El Cid
description: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Vivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

title: Wristcutters: A Love Story
description: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

title: Smoke Signals
description: Arnold rescued Thomas from a fire when he was a child. Thomas thinks of Arnold as a hero, while Arnold's son Victor resents his father's alcoholism, violence and abandonment of his family.

title: Waterloo
description: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

title: The Streetfighter
description: The adventures of a drifter turned illegal prize-fighter during the Depression Era in New Orleans.

title: The Ipcress File
description: In London, a wisecracking spy investigates the kidnapping and brainwashing of British scientists while dealing with the constraints of his agency's bureaucracy.

title: Before Night Falls
description: The life of Cuban poet and novelist, Reinaldo Arenas.

title: Birdy
description: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

title: Two-Lane Blacktop
description: While drag-racing through the American Southwest in a Chevvy 150, a driver and his mechanic cross paths with an alluring hitchhiker and the inexperienced, tall tale-spinning driver of a GTO.

title: Che: Part One
description: In 1956, Ernesto 'Che' Guevara and a band of Castro-led Cuban exiles mobilize an army to topple the regime of dictator Fulgencio Batista.

description: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
description: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

title: The Mighty
description: Two young boys, both social outcasts in their small town, form an unlikely friendship.

title: Julius Caesar
description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

description: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

title: Benny's Video
description: A 14-year-old video enthusiast obsessed with violent films decides to make one of his own and show it to his parents, with tragic results.

title: The Science of Sleep
description: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

description: Two cops lost in the deep south of Spain. One serial killer to catch. A lot of secrets and lies to disclose.

title: Dogman

description: An ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by a homeless ex-sailor, so they partner up as they head east together.

title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
description: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

title: Mrs Brown
description: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

title: Broken
description: Three suburban English families' lives intertwine with tragic consequences.

title: Broken Embraces
description: Harry Caine, a blind writer, reaches this moment in time when he has to heal his wounds from 14 years back. He was then still known by his real name, Mateo Blanco, and directing his last movie.

title: Insomnia

description: A reporter pretends to be Jewish in order to cover a story on anti-Semitism, and personally discovers the true depths of bigotry and hatred.

title: Barbara
description: A doctor working in 1980s East Germany finds herself banished to a small country hospital.

title: Lean on Pete
description: A teenager gets a summer job working for a horse trainer and befriends the fading racehorse, Lean on Pete.

title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
description: A breathtaking, goose flesh igniting, awe inspiring love journey of an ordinary man Suri and his 'total opposite' love Taani.

title: The Apostle
description: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

title: Champions

title: Conviction

title: Ittefaq

description: In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.

description: A law student starts working as a night watchman at The Department of Forensic Medicine in Copenhagen. His mad friend gets him on a game of dare that escalates. As a serial-killer's victims start piling up at work, he becomes a suspect.

title: Educating Rita
description: An alcoholic professor has been hired by a working-class girl for higher education.

title: The Spanish Prisoner
description: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

description: Legendary martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung fights against foreign forces' plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.

description: After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.

title: Stardust Memories
description: While attending a retrospective of his work, a filmmaker recalls his life and his loves: the inspirations for his films.

title: I Confess
description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

title: Another Woman

title: Talaash
description: Inspector Surjan Shekhawat, who is dealing with a depressing past, has to investigate a high profile murder case, deal with his crumbling marriage and use the help and solace of a prostitute by the name of Rosie.

title: Modigliani

title: La Cage aux Folles
description: The manager of a Saint-Tropez nightclub featuring drag entertainment, and his star attraction, are a gay couple. Madness ensues when his straight son brings home a fiancée and her ultra-conservative parents to meet them.

title: Tape
description: Three old high school friends meet in a Michigan motel room to dissect painful memories from their past.

description: Three generations of women share the same problem--marriage woes--and want to put an end to it.

title: D.O.A.

title: Rams
description: In a remote Icelandic farming valley, two brothers who haven't spoken in 40 years have to come together in order to save what's dearest to them - their sheep.

title: The Dish
description: A remote Australian community, populated by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

title: Soul Kitchen

title: The Draughtsman's Contract
description: A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.

title: A Better Life
description: A gardener in East L.A. struggles to keep his son away from gangs and immigration agents while trying to give his son the opportunities he never had.

title: The Uninvited

description: A drama centered on two fighters in the Holger Danske World War II resistance group.

title: Heroic Losers
description: In times of the infamous Argentinian Corralito, the neighbors of a little town trace a plan to recover the money they lost after learning that their bank manager and a corrupt lawyer have stolen it.

title: Metropolis
description: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.

title: NH10
description: On their way to a weekend retreat, a married couple find their dream vacation turn into a nightmare when they cross paths with a dangerous gang.

title: Gunga Din
description: In 19th century India, three British soldiers and a native waterbearer must stop a secret mass revival of the murderous Thuggee cult before it can rampage across the land.

description: A small-town girl overcomes all societal barriers to become a national-level athlete, but her glory is hindered when she is asked to undergo a gender test.

description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Death & Rebirth

title: Den brysomme mannen

title: Wild Bill
description: A street-toughened parolee finds his two boys abandoned by their mum and fending for themselves. Time to step up, or not.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'
description: One peaceful day on Earth, two remnants of Freeza's army named Sorube and Tagoma arrive searching for the Dragon Balls with the aim of reviving Freeza. They succeed, and Freeza subsequently seeks revenge on the Saiya-jin.

title: Lantana
description: The relationships of four couples unravel after the discovery of a young woman's body in Lantana bush in suburban Sydney.

title: Take the Money and Run

title: The Wing or The Thigh?
description: Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and the publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast-food entrepreneur Tricatel to save the French art of cooking. After ... See full summary »

description: In the 1970s, an anchorman's stint as San Diego's top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

title: In the Mouth of Madness
description: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

title: Silence

title: Deja Vu

In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

title: Allied
description: In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.

title: Dredd

title: The King of Staten Island

description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: Little Shop of Horrors
description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

title: Dressed to Kill
description: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

title: If Beale Street Could Talk
description: A young woman embraces her pregnancy while she and her family set out to prove her childhood friend and lover innocent of a crime he didn't commit.

title: Vikram Vedha
description: A tough police officer sets out to track down and kill an equally tough gangsters.

title: About a Boy
description: A cynical, immature young man is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy.

title: Runaway Jury
description: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

title: Die Hard 2
description: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Wild

title: The Call

title: Alive

title: Monster's Ball

title: Chicken Run
description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

title: The Spectacular Now
description: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

title: Let Me In
description: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

title: Audition
description: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

title: The Frighteners
description: After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead, and he uses that gift to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

title: Winter's Bone
description: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

title: American Underdog
description: The story of NFL MVP and Hall of Fame quarterback Kurt Warner, who went from stocking shelves at a supermarket to becoming an American Football star.

title: Parallel Mothers
description: The story of two mothers who bond in unexpected way after giving birth the same day.

title: Locke
description: Ivan Locke, a dedicated family man and successful construction manager, receives a phone call on the eve of the biggest challenge of his career that sets in motion a series of events that threaten his carefully cultivated existence.

title: Out of Africa
description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
description: A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

title: Belle: The Dragon and the Freckled Princess
description: Suzu is a shy high school student living in a rural village. For years, she has only been a shadow of herself. But when she enters "U", a massive virtual world, she escapes into her online persona as Belle, a globally-beloved singer.

title: Shiva Baby
description: At a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student runs into her sugar daddy and ex girlfriend.

title: Seven Years in Tibet
description: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

title: The Time Traveler's Wife
description: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

title: Phone Booth
description: Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.

title: Official Competition
description: A wealthy businessman hires a famous filmmaker to help make a smash hit film.

title: Leave No Trace
description: A father and his thirteen-year-old daughter are living an ideal existence in a vast urban park in Portland, Oregon when a small mistake derails their lives forever.

title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
description: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

title: Elephant
description: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

title: The Host
description: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and begins attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.

title: The Accused
description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

title: The Adventures of Baron Munchausen
description: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences across late 18th-century Europe with his band of misfits.

title: The Ides of March
description: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
description: The Red Ribbon Army from Goku's past has returned with two new androids to challenge him and his friends.

title: We Bought a Zoo
description: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

title: The Muppets
description: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

title: No Way Out
description: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

title: Marnie
description: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

title: Elle
description: A successful businesswoman gets caught up in a game of cat and mouse as she tracks down the unknown man who raped her.

title: The Jerk
description: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

title: Race
description: Jesse Owens' quest to become the greatest track and field athlete in history thrusts him onto the world stage of the 1936 Olympics, where he faces off against Adolf Hitler's vision of Aryan supremacy.

title: Three Kings
description: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

title: The Railway Man
description: A former British Army officer, who was tortured as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, discovers that the man responsible for much of his treatment is still alive and sets out to confront him.

title: The Poseidon Adventure
description: Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.

title: Firebird
description: Firebird follows a handsome, soulful young soldier who embarks on a clandestine sexual affair with a charismatic fighter pilot on a Soviet Air Force Base at the height of 1970's Communist rule.

title: Far from the Madding Crowd
description: In Victorian England, the independent and headstrong Bathsheba Everdene attracts three very different suitors: Gabriel Oak, a sheep farmer; Frank Troy, a reckless Sergeant; and William Boldwood, a prosperous and mature bachelor.

title: Day of the Dead
description: As the world is overrun by zombies, a group of scientists and military personnel sheltering in an underground bunker in Florida must determine how they should deal with the undead horde.

title: Concussion
description: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

title: First Reformed
description: A minister of a small congregation in upstate New York grapples with mounting despair brought on by tragedy, worldly concerns and a tormented past.

title: Crossroads
description: A wannabe blues-guitar virtuoso seeks a long-lost song by legendary musician Roberto Johnson.

title: Carnage
description: Two pairs of parents hold a cordial meeting after their sons are involved in a fight, though as their time together progresses, increasingly childish behavior throws the discussion into chaos.

title: Beautiful Girls
description: A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.

title: Casualties of War
description: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (Ultimate Edition)
description: Batman is manipulated by Lex Luthor to fear Superman. Superman´s existence is meanwhile dividing the world and he is framed for murder during an international crisis. The heroes clash and force the neutral Wonder Woman to reemerge.

title: Queen & Slim
description: A couple's first date takes an unexpected turn when a police officer pulls them over.

title: Miracles from Heaven
description: Based on the incredible true story of the Beam family.

title: McLintock!
description: Wealthy rancher G. W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

title: Girl
description: A promising teenage dancer enrolls at a prestigious ballet school while grappling with her gender dysphoria.

title: Sneakers
description: A security pro finds his past returning to haunt him when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

title: The Good Boss
description: Awaiting a visit by a committee that could give his company an award for excellence, the owner of an industrial scales manufacturing business tries to resolve any problems from his workers in enough time.

title: Benny & Joon
description: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

title: Klute
description: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

title: The Dark Crystal
description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

title: The Thing from Another World
description: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.

title: Lords of Dogtown
description: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

title: Nowhere Boy
description: A chronicle of John Lennon's first years, focused mainly in his adolescence and his relationship with his stern aunt Mimi, who raised him, and his absentee mother Julia, who re-entered his life at a crucial moment in his young life.

title: Thirst
description: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

title: Gridiron Gang
description: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

title: Blue Ruin
description: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

title: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
description: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

title: Black Christmas
description: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

title: Swiss Family Robinson
description: A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.

title: The World According to Garp
description: A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.

title: Tangerine
description: A hooker tears through Tinseltown on Christmas Eve searching for the pimp who broke her heart.

title: Rumble Fish
description: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

title: The Jacket
description: A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

title: State of Play
description: When a congressional aide is killed, a Washington, D.C. journalist starts investigating the case involving the Representative, his old college friend.

title: Big Jake
description: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

title: Agora
description: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hope of pursuing freedom while falling in love with his mistress, the philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

title: Michael Collins
description: Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.

title: One Night in Miami
description: A fictional account of one incredible night where icons Muhammad Ali, Malcolm X, Sam Cooke, and Jim Brown gathered discussing their roles in the Civil Rights Movement and cultural upheaval of the 60s.

title: The Sword in the Stone
description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Bad Santa
description: A miserable conman and his partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. But they run into problems when the conman befriends a troubled kid.

title: Mosul
description: A police unit from Mosul fight to liberate the Iraqi city from thousands of ISIS militants.

title: Winnie the Pooh
description: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

title: Breathe
description: The inspiring true love story of Robin (Andrew Garfield) and Diana Cavendish (Claire Foy), an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. Their heartwarming celebration of human possibility marks the directorial debut of Andy Serkis.

title: On the Beach
description: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

title: Nicholas Nickleby
description: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

title: Ong-Bak: The Thai Warrior
description: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

title: Timecrimes
description: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

title: Three O'Clock High
description: A nerd gets himself in hot water with the new bully, a quiet bad boy who challenges him to fight on the grounds of their high school after the day's end.

title: Black Mirror: Bandersnatch
description: A young programmer starts to question reality when he adapts a mad writer's fantasy novel into a video game.

title: The Kings of Summer
description: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.

title: The Cat Returns
description: After helping a cat, a seventeen-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat Prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.

title: Bad Education
description: The beloved superintendent of New York's Roslyn school district and his staff, friends and relatives become the prime suspects in the unfolding of the single largest public school embezzlement scandal in American history.

title: Wag the Dog
description: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.

title: Words on Bathroom Walls
description: Diagnosed with a mental illness halfway through his senior year of high school, a witty, introspective teen struggles to keep it a secret while falling in love with a brilliant classmate who inspires him to not be defined by his condition.

title: The White Tiger
description: An ambitious Indian driver uses his wit and cunning to escape from poverty and rise to the top. An epic journey based on the New York Times bestseller.

title: Fearless
description: A man's personality is dramatically changed after surviving a major airline crash.

title: Balto
description: An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

title: One-Eyed Jacks
description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured, but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

title: Catch-22
description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

title: The Year of Living Dangerously
description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

title: Kinsey
description: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

title: Time After Time
description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

title: Southern Comfort
description: During a routine exercise, a team of National Guards are threatened by angry and violent locals.

title: I'm Your Man
description: In order to obtain research funds for her studies, a scientist accepts an offer to participate in an extraordinary experiment: for three weeks, she is to live with a humanoid robot, created to make her happy.

title: Like Water for Chocolate
description: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.

title: Silkwood
description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
description: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: The Fearless Vampire Killers
description: A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.

title: Hatari!
description: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.

title: It's Kind of a Funny Story
description: A clinically-depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.

title: Half Nelson
description: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

title: Titus
description: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

title: In the Fade
description: Katja's life collapses after the deaths of her husband and son in a bomb attack. After a time of mourning and injustice, Katja seeks revenge.

title: The Seven Year Itch
description: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbor.

title: The Driver
description: A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.

title: First Cow
description: A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.

title: The Horse Soldiers
description: In 1863, a Union outfit is sent behind Confederate lines in Mississippi to destroy enemy railroads but a captive southern belle and the unit's doctor cause frictions within ranks.

title: The Sons of Katie Elder
description: Ranch owner Katie Elder's four sons determine to avenge the murder of their father and the swindling of their mother.

title: Diner
description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

title: Dangerous Beauty
description: A Venetian courtesan becomes a hero to her city, but later becomes the target of an inquisition by the Church for witchcraft.

title: The Girl Who Played with Fire
description: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.

title: Whatever Works
description: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcé from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

title: Chopper
description: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

title: The Devil's Double
description: A chilling vision of the house of Saddam. The world of Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was given a choice; either be the double for Saddam's sadistic son, or die.

title: White Oleander
description: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

title: Orlando
description: After Queen Elizabeth I commands him not to grow old, a young nobleman struggles with love and his place in the world.

title: Quo Vadis
description: After fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia, he begins to question the tyrannical leadership of the despotic emperor Nero.

title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
description: The relationship between writer AA Milne and his son, Christopher Robin, and how this became the inspiration for Winnie the Pooh.

title: Chasing Mavericks
description: When young Jay Moriarity discovers that the mythic Mavericks surf break, one of the biggest waves on Earth, exists just miles from his Santa Cruz home, he enlists the help of local legend Frosty Hesson to train him to survive it.

title: La Grande Bouffe
description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

title: Cross of Honour
description: Norway, WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin, they realize the only way to survive the winter is to place the rules of war aside.

title: Rex
description: Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

title: Guys and Dolls
description: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

title: The Most Dangerous Game
description: A psychotic big game hunter deliberately strands a luxury yacht on a remote island, where he begins to hunt its passengers for sport.

title: Don
description: Vijay is recruited by a police officer to masquerade as his lookalike Don, the leader of an international gang of smugglers. Things go wrong when the officer is killed and Vijay is left to fend for himself.

title: Turkish Delight
description: A young love faces with old problems.

title: La piscine
description: Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.

title: The Whistleblower
description: A drama based on the experiences of Kathryn Bolkovac, a Nebraska cop who served as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia and outed the U.N. for covering up a sex trafficking scandal.

title: The Decameron
description: An adaptation of nine stories from Boccaccio's "Decameron".

title: 99 Homes
description: A recently unemployed single father struggles to get back his foreclosed home by working for the real estate broker who is the source of his frustration.

title: The Fly
description: A scientist has a horrific accident when he tries to use his newly invented teleportation device.

title: Narc
description: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

title: Win Win
description: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.
The events leading up to an 11:14 p.m. car crash, from five very different perspectives.

title: The Savages
description: A sister and brother face the realities of familial responsibility as they begin to care for their ailing father.

title: Venus in Fur
description: An actress attempts to convince a director how she's perfect for a role in his upcoming production.

title: Tracks
description: A young woman goes on a 1,700-mile trek across the deserts of West Australia with four camels and her faithful dog.

title: The Power of One
description: An English boy, living in Africa during World War II, through his boxing prowess, becomes a symbol of hope, in a time of war.

title: Night Moves
description: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.

title: Kinky Boots
description: A drag queen comes to the rescue of a man who, after inheriting his father's shoe factory, needs to diversify his product if he wants to keep the business afloat.

title: The 7th Voyage of Sinbad
description: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

title: The Parallax View
description: An ambitious reporter gets in way-over-his-head trouble while investigating a senator's assassination which leads to a vast conspiracy involving a multinational corporation behind every event in the world's headlines.

title: Help!
description: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

title: Human Traffic
description: Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love, and club culture.

title: The Chase
description: The citizens of a Texan town become concerned and panicked when a local bad boy escapes prison and heads for his hometown.

title: A Love Song for Bobby Long
description: A headstrong young woman returns to New Orleans after the death of her estranged mother.

title: In Order of Disappearance
description: After his son is murdered by drug dealers, a snowplow driver starts seeking revenge.

title: Nixon
description: A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.

title: Carnival of Souls
description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
description: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.

title: District B13
description: In the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and an ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

title: 5 to 7
description: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

title: Safe
description: An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.

title: Father of the Bride
description: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and organizational trouble of arranging the wedding.

title: 45 Years
description: A married couple preparing to celebrate their wedding anniversary receives shattering news that promises to forever change the course of their lives.

title: First They Killed My Father
description: Cambodian author and human rights activist Loung Ung recounts the horrors she suffered as a child under the rule of the deadly Khmer Rouge.

title: Gantz: O
description: After being brutally murdered in a subway station, a teen boy awakens to find himself resurrected by a strange computer named Gantz, and forced to fight a large force of invading aliens in Osaka.

title: Wild Rose
description: A troubled young Glaswegian woman dreams of becoming a Nashville country star.

title: The Believer
description: A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic philosophy. Based on the factual story of a K.K.K. member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.

title: Cemetery Man
description: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

title: The Absent One
description: The murder of young twins initially implicates a group of upper class students as the killers, though the case takes a turn or two from its starting point.

title: Batman: The Long Halloween, Part Two
description: The killer known as Holiday continues to stalk the Falcone crime family while a new class of costumed criminal rises in Gotham City. Batman suspects that a former ally might be the serial killer.

title: One False Move
description: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

title: Barfly
description: Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.

title: Valerie and Her Week of Wonders
description: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world, based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.

title: The Messenger
description: An American soldier struggles with an ethical dilemma when he becomes involved with a widow of a fallen officer.

title: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
description: An American expatriate in Rome attempts to unmask a serial killer whom he witnessed in the act of an attempted murder - and is now hunting him and his girlfriend.

title: L.I.E.
description: A 15-year-old Long Island boy loses everything and everyone he knows, soon becoming involved in a relationship with a much older man.

title: Saboteur
description: A young man accused of sabotage goes on the lam to prove his innocence.

title: The Great Muppet Caper
description: Kermit the Frog, The Great Gonzo, and Fozzie Bear are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
description: Pele's meteoric rise from the slums of Sao Paulo to leading Brazil to its first World Cup victory at the age of 17 is chronicled in this biographical drama.

title: The Big Red One
description: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.

title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
description: Doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar Anton Phibes seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for the death of his wife.

title: The Hater
description: A young man searches for purpose in a net of hatred and violence that he tries to control.

title: The Wings of the Dove
description: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

title: Belle Epoque
description: A 1931 Spanish military deserter finds himself on a lonely farm until the farmer's four daughters pay a visit and he falls for all of them.

title: Eye of the Needle
description: A ruthless German spy, trying to get out of Britain with vital information about D-Day, must spend time with a young woman and her crippled husband.

title: Theorem
description: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

title: Sleeper
description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

title: Thursday
description: A former L.A. drug dealer has moved to Houston to make a new life for himself as a married architect. Everything falls apart when he is suddenly visited by one of his former cohorts who comes carrying heroin.

title: Black Sunday
description: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

title: Venus
description: Life for a pair of veteran actors gets turned upside down after they meet a brash teenager.

title: Infamous
description: While researching his novel "In Cold Blood", Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

title: Love in the Afternoon
description: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

title: Forever Strong
description: A rugby player is put up in a juvenile detention center. There he plays for the Highland Rugby team and ultimately plays against his father in the National Championships.

title: Law of Desire
description: A gay filmmaker becomes involved with an obsessive fan while still pining for his absent true love. Meanwhile, he shares a close but complex relationship with his trans sister, an actress.

title: Trash
description: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.

title: God Bless America
description: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

title: Julieta

title: Fantasia 2000

title: Kajaki
description: Kajaki Dam 2006. A company of young British soldiers encounter an unexpected, terrifying enemy. A dried-out river bed, and under every step the possibility of an anti-personnel mine. A mine that could cost you your leg - or your life.

description: A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.

title: Brubaker

title: Blood and Black Lace
description: A masked, shadowy killer brutally murders the models of a scandalous fashion house in Rome.

title: Von Ryan's Express
description: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

title: Mon Roi

description: The story of three close friends who are involved in a love-triangle.

title: Trees Lounge
description: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".

description: When her husband goes missing at the beach, a female professor begins to mentally disintegrate as her denial of his disappearance becomes delusional.

title: Caramel
description: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.

title: Adam
description: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.

title: Bird
description: The troubled life and career of jazz musician Charlie "Bird" Parker.

description: Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?

description: The Z-Fighters must contend with Lord Beerus, the God of Destruction, but only a God can fight a God, and none of them are Gods. However with the creation of the Super Saiyan God, will the Z-Fighters be able to defeat Lord Beerus?

title: Khuda Haafiz
description: A newly married couple's life falls in jeopardy when the wife goes missing under mysterious circumstances.

2 cops are promised by the retiring chief of the Paris police that the one, getting the violent gang robbing armored trucks, will get his job. The 2 will do whatever it takes to get the promotion, even if it means breaking the law.

title: Brother
description: A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.

description: Kurup is a criminal who is on the run from police after murdering someone for life insurance fraud.

description: A chef with a mysterious past spends the day with a waitress who needs a friend.

description: Goodbye Bafana is the true story of a white South African racist whose life was profoundly altered by the black prisoner he guarded for twenty years. The prisoner's name was Nelson Mandela.

description: Hedonistic bachelor Nick falls for an escaped mental patient.

title: Asterix in Britain
description: The diminutive Asterix and his rather larger companion Obelix, warriors of the last village in Gaul still free after the Roman invasion, set out on a mission to deliver a barrel of their ... See full summary »

description: On a fishing boat at sea, a 60-year old man has been raising a girl since she was a baby. It is agreed that they will get married on her 17th birthday, and she is 16 now. They live a quiet and secluded life, renting the boat to day fishermen and practicing strange divination rites. Their life changes when a teenage student comes aboard...

title: Barbarian

description: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper responsible for a mass shooting.

description: Following clues to the origin of mankind, a team finds a structure on a distant moon, but they soon realize they are not alone.

description: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

description: Follows a woman checking into a psychiatric ward to investigate a homicide.

description: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.
