title: Into the Storm
description: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

title: Gothika
description: A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.

title: Lake Placid
description: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

title: Dracula: Dead and Loving It
description: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
description: While still out to destroy the evil Umbrella Corporation, Alice joins a group of survivors living in a prison surrounded by the infected who also want to relocate to the mysterious but supposedly unharmed safe haven known only as Arcadia.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

title: Skyscraper
description: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family is trapped inside by criminals.

title: Romeo & Juliet
description: Romeo and Juliet secretly wed despite the sworn contempt their families hold for each other. It is not long, however, before a chain of fateful events changes the lives of both families forever.

title: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
description: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

description: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.

title: Jaws 2
description: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

title: All Eyez on Me
description: Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.

description: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.

title: Haywire
description: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.

title: Saving Silverman
description: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

title: The Wretched
description: A defiant teenage boy, struggling with his parents' imminent divorce, faces off with a thousand year-old witch, who is living beneath the skin of and posing as the woman next door.

title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

title: Son in Law
description: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

title: Semi-Pro
description: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true.

title: The Wolfman
description: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten and subsequently cursed by a werewolf.

title: Christmas with the Coopers
description: The intertwined stories of four generations of Coopers unfold right before the annual family reunion on Christmas Eve. Can they survive the most beautiful time of the year?

title: The Haunting in Connecticut
description: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

title: The Gunman
description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

title: The Glass House
description: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

title: Straw Dogs
description: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

title: Apartment 1BR
description: Sarah tries to start anew in LA, but her neighbours are not what they seem.

title: Tau
description: A woman is held captive by a scientist in a futuristic smart house, and hopes to escape by reasoning with the Artificial Intelligence that controls the house.

title: To the Wonder
description: After falling in love in Paris, Marina and Neil come to Oklahoma, where problems arise. Their church's Spanish-born pastor struggles with his faith, while Neil encounters a woman from his childhood.

title: What a Girl Wants
description: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

title: Monte Carlo
description: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.

title: The Perfect Date
description: To save up for college, Brooks Rattigan creates an app where anyone can pay him to play the perfect stand-in boyfriend for any occasion.

title: Black Water
description: A terrifying tale of survival in the mangrove swamps of Northern Australia

title: St. Trinian's
description: In order to save their bankrupt school, a group of troublesome girls stage a robbery with a group of geniuses on their backs

title: The Forgotten
description: After being told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover there is a much bigger enemy at work.

title: Miss Bala
description: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

title: The Relic
description: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

title: The Getaway
description: An ex-con and his devoted wife must flee from danger when a heist doesn't go as planned.

title: Suburbicon
description: As a 1950s suburban community self-destructs, a home invasion has sinister consequences for one seemingly normal family.

title: The Green Hornet
description: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

title: Reindeer Games
description: After assuming his dead cell-mate's identity to get with the other man's girlfriend, an ex-convict finds himself a reluctant participant in a casino heist.

title: 21 & Over
description: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.

title: Troop Beverly Hills
description: A soon to be divorced Beverly Hills socialite is determined to prove to her husband and herself that she can finish what she starts out to do, by becoming a den mother to a troop of Beverly Hills Girl Scouts.

title: Happy Feet Two
description: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

title: Stuck on You
description: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

title: Curly Sue
description: A homeless man and his young companion, who survive by conning people, meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
description: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.

title: Friends with Money
description: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
description: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens on Halloween Eve and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

title: The Cobbler
description: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

title: Sierra Burgess Is a Loser
description: A case of mistaken identity results in unexpected romance when the most popular girl in high school and the biggest loser must come together to win over their crushes.

title: Runaway
description: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

title: Final Score
description: After deadly terrorists abduct his niece at a soccer match, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her and prevent mass destruction.

title: Heaven Is for Real
description: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

title: Airport '77
description: Art thieves hijack a 747, hit fog and crash into the ocean, trapping them and the passengers under one hundred feet of water.

title: Hard to Kill
description: Left for dead with his wife killed in their house, L.A. Detective Mason Storm will have to make a quick recovery, expose those behind the murder and take revenge.

title: The Divide
description: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.

title: Captain Ron
description: A Chicagoan inherits an old yacht. He, his wife, daughter and son fly to a Caribbean island and hire a dubious Captain Ron to sail them on an adventure to Miami.

title: Wetlands
description: The adventures of an eccentric girl who has strange attitudes towards hygiene and sexuality longs for the reunion of her divorced parents.

title: Saw V
description: Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.

title: Paranormal Activity 3
description: In 1988, young sisters Katie and Kristi befriend an invisible entity who resides in their home Name Toby.

title: The Last Five Years
description: A struggling actress and her novelist lover each illustrate the struggle and deconstruction of their love affair.

title: Raise Your Voice
description: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

title: Life of Crime
description: Two common criminals get more than they bargained for after kidnapping the wife of a corrupt real-estate developer who shows no interest in paying the $1 million dollar ransom for her safe return.

title: Vox Lux
description: An unusual set of circumstances brings unexpected success to a pop star.

title: Air America
description: A young pilot finds himself recruited unwittingly into a covert and corrupt CIA airlift operation in Laos during the Vietnam conflict.

title: Table 19
description: Eloise, having been relieved of maid of honor duties after being unceremoniously dumped by the best man via text, decides to attend the wedding anyway, only to find herself seated with five fellow unwanted guests at the dreaded Table 19.

title: Goon: Last of the Enforcers
description: A hockey player plagued by injuries is confronted with the possibility of retirement when a tough new player challenges his status as the league's top enforcer.

title: The Toy
description: An underemployed reporter finds himself literally purchased as a toy for a rich spoiled brat.

title: Bad News Bears
description: A grizzled little league coach tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.

title: Firewall
description: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

title: A Very Brady Sequel
description: The Bradys are surprised when a man claiming to be Carol's long lost first husband shows up at their home. Before long, his strange actions cause them to question his motives.

title: The Chase
description: Escaped convict Jack Hammond takes a woman hostage and sets off for the Mexican border with the police hot on his tail.

title: Silent Night, Deadly Night
description: Little Billy witnesses his parents getting killed by Santa after being warned by his senile grandpa that Santa punishes those who are naughty. Now Billy is 18 and out of the orphanage, and he has just become Santa himself.

title: A Thousand Words
description: After stretching the truth on a deal with a spiritual guru, literary agent Jack McCall finds a Bodhi tree on his property. Its appearance holds a valuable lesson on the consequences of every word he speaks.

title: Black Sheep
description: An experiment in genetic engineering turns harmless sheep into bloodthirsty killers that terrorize a sprawling New Zealand farm.

title: Wishmaster
description: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to Earth.

title: Mine
description: After a failed assassination attempt, a United States Marine finds himself stranded in the desert. Exposed to the elements, he must survive the dangers of the desert and battle the psychological and physical tolls of the treacherous conditions.

title: The Reef
description: A great white shark hunts the crew of a capsized sailboat along the Great Barrier Reef.

title: Suspect Zero
description: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers, and one F.B.I. Agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

title: The Tunnel
description: An investigation into a government cover-up leads to a network of abandoned train tunnels deep beneath the heart of Sydney. As a journalist and her crew hunt for the story it quickly becomes clear the story is hunting them.

title: War on Everyone
description: Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.

title: Extinction
description: And suddenly, overnight, the world came to a halt. Two men, two survivors, one kid, and hatred that separates them. A place forgotten by everyone, including the creatures that inhabit the Earth... until now.

title: Passengers
description: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.

title: The Seventh Sign
description: Abby Quinn is eagerly awaiting childbirth but is haunted by dreams where she suffers a miscarriage. When she decides to rent a room to a mysterious stranger, she realizes a chain of events that will unleash the end of humanity.

title: Cradle 2 the Grave
description: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

title: Smiley Face
description: After a young actress unknowingly eats her roommate's marijuana cupcakes, her day becomes a series of misadventures.

title: Silk
description: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

title: Cry Wolf
description: Eight unsuspecting high school seniors at a posh boarding school, who delight themselves on playing games of lies, come face-to-face with terror and learn that nobody believes a liar - even when they're telling the truth.

title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
description: Teenager Darren Shan meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a vampire. After a series of events, Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque du Freak, becoming a creature of the night.

title: Honeymoon in Vegas
description: Jack loses $65,000 in poker in Las Vegas, where he's marrying Betsy. The wedding will have to wait as the poker winner wants the weekend with Betsy to cancel the debt. She accepts. Whom will she marry?

title: Next of Kin
description: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

title: Bulletproof
description: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

title: The Ant Bully
description: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his water gun, he's magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

title: Let It Snow
description: In a small town on Christmas Eve, a snowstorm brings together a group of young people.

title: Sudden Death
description: A former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

title: Kin
description: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, an ex-con and his adopted teenage brother go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

title: Mad Money
description: Three female employees of the Federal Reserve plot to steal money that is about to be destroyed.

title: Beowulf & Grendel
description: In Denmark, during the 6th century, Danish king Hrothgar and his warriors kill a troll whose son, Grendel, vows revenge.

title: Peter Pan 2: Return to Never Land
description: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

title: Escape from Planet Earth
description: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

title: All the Pretty Horses
description: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

title: Baskin
description: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

title: Absentia
description: A woman and her sister begin to link a mysterious tunnel to a series of disappearances, including that of her own husband.

title: Wind Chill
description: Two college students share a ride home for the holidays, but when they break down on a deserted stretch of road, they are preyed upon by the ghosts of people who have died there.

title: Last Shift
description: A rookie cop's 1st shift alone in the last night of a closing police station turns into a living nightmare.

title: Terror Train
description: Three years after a prank went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train.

title: Bounce
description: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

title: Babe: Pig in the City
description: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

title: I Still See You
description: Set ten years after an apocalyptic event that killed millions and left the world inhabited by ghosts.

title: Rampart
description: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.

title: The Guilt Trip
description: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.

title: Free Birds
description: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history, and get Turkeys off the Thanksgiving menu for good.

title: 24 Hours to Live
description: An assassin seeks redemption after being given a second chance at life.

title: Let Us Prey
description: Held in a remote police station, a mysterious stranger takes over the minds and souls of everyone inside.

title: Amelia
description: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.

title: Waist Deep
description: An ex-convict (Tyrese) gets tangled up with a gang after his car is hijacked with his son inside.

title: Wonder Park
description: The imagination of a wildly creative girl comes alive in an amusement park.

title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
description: Remake of the 1956 film noir film "Beyond a Reasonable Doubt" in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt district attorney takes an unexpected turn.

title: All About the Benjamins
description: Bounty hunter Bucum chases bail-jumper Reggie, who runs right into the scene of a diamond heist and murder and gets shot at as well. Later they become partners in their pursuit of the $20M in diamonds and lottery ticket. Their women join.

title: Laws of Attraction
description: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

title: Annapolis
description: Set against the backdrop of boxing at the Naval Academy, centers on a young man from the wrong side of the tracks whose dream of attending Annapolis becomes a reality.

title: Starship Troopers: Invasion
description: A black op has gone terribly wrong. Now, Captain Carmen Ibanez and a hardcore trooper famed as Major Henry "Hero" Varro must lead a team of battle-weary troopers to find the missing ship and discover what went wrong.

title: The Forger
description: A thief works with his father and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.

title: Sgt. Bilko
description: Sgt. Bilko is a well-liked conman in charge of the army base's motor pool, developing a hover tank and unofficially of gambling etc. One man hates Bilko and he's coming to inspect the base for possible closure.

title: Management
description: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

title: Taxi 3
description: Out to stop a new gang disguised as Santa Claus, Emilien and Daniel must also handle major changes in their personal relationships.

title: The Accidental Spy
description: At a Hong Kong shopping center, Buck Yuen's (Jackie Chan's) intuition warns him. He saves a robbery's loot and gets on television, ends up in Istanbul via South Korea, and accidentally becomes a spy. Fortunately, he knows Kung Fu.

title: The Million Dollar Hotel
description: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
description: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

title: Murder Party
description: A random invitation to a Halloween party leads a man into the hands of a rogue collective intent on murdering him for the sake of their art, sparking a bloodbath of mishap, mayhem and hilarity.

title: A Christmas Prince
description: When a reporter goes undercover as a tutor to get the inside scoop on a playboy prince, she gets tangled in some royal intrigue and ends up finding love - but will she be able to keep up her lie?

title: F/X2
description: A special effects man helps his girlfriend's ex, a cop, with a sting operation, where the ex gets killed. Something's off and he investigates with help from an ex-cop PI friend.

title: Mary Reilly
description: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Henry Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Edward Hyde.

title: Bobby Z
description: A DEA agent provides former Marine Tim Kearney with a way out of his prison sentence: impersonate Bobby Z, a recently deceased drug dealer, in a hostage switch with a crime lord.

title: Beyond Re-Animator
description: After 13 years in prison, the mad scientist from Re-Animator (1985) gets a new chance to experiment with the arrival of a young prison doctor, who secretly hopes to learn to reanimate dead people. Good intentions turn to horror.

title: The Canal
description: A film archivist finds his sanity crumbling after he is given an old 16mm film reel with footage from a horrific murder that occurred in the early 1900's.

title: Retreat
description: Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.

title: Outpost
description: In war-torn Eastern Europe, a mysterious businessman hires a group of mercenaries on a routine mission to protect him not knowing of the long-hidden secret that lies there.

title: The Oranges
description: The enduring friendship between the Walling and Ostroff families is tested when Nina, the prodigal Ostroff daughter, returns home for the holidays after a five-year absence and enters into an affair with David, head of the Walling family.

title: Pokémon 3: The Movie
description: In the town of Greenfield, a young, lonely girl's dreams and wishes are brought into reality by a collective of reality-warping Pokémon.

title: Goal II: Living the Dream
description: When Newcastle United soccer star Santiago Muñez (Kuno Becker) is offered a spot with Real Madrid, he accepts, but the move - accompanied by big money and fame - tests his ties and loyalties to family, friends, and business acquaintances.

title: Novocaine
description: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him and steals all of the drugs from his practice.

title: A California Christmas
description: With his carefree lifestyle on the line, a wealthy charmer poses as a ranch hand to get a hardworking farmer to sell her family's land before Christmas.

title: Pimp
description: An urban love story set on the hard streets of the Bronx. A struggling female Pimp, named Wednesday, grows up learning the game from her dad. Once he's gone she's left to look out for her prostitute mother and girlfriend Nikki.

4 girls out on a 3 days trip in to 2 cities, if they survive. While Jo is working in a supermarket, her 3 friends are all out on their adventures. A chance encounter with diamond thieves sends them on a collision course with fate itself.

title: Death Defying Acts
description: On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him.

title: Kill Me Three Times
description: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.

title: Ginger Snaps Back: The Beginning
description: Set in 19th Century Canada, Brigette and her sister Ginger take refuge in a Traders' Fort which later becomes under siege by some savage werewolves.

title: A Christmas Horror Story
description: Interwoven stories that take place on Christmas Eve, as told by one festive radio host: A family brings home more than a Christmas tree, a student documentary becomes a living nightmare, a Christmas spirit terrorizes, Santa slays evil.

title: StreetDance 3D
description: In order to win the Street Dance Championships, a dance crew is forced to work with ballet dancers from the Royal Dance School in exchange for rehearsal space.

title: Operation Christmas Drop
description: Congressional aide Erica forgoes family Christmas to travel at her boss's behest. At a beach side Air Force base, she clashes with Capt. Andrew Jantz, who knows her assignment is finding reasons to defund the facility.

title: Hurlyburly
description: Hollywood movers and shakers dissect their own personal lives when everything seems to clash together.

title: Dance of the Dead
description: On the night of the big High-School Prom, the dead rise to eat the living, and the only people who can stop them are the losers who couldn't get dates to the dance.

title: RRRrrrr!!!
description: A tribe of prehistoric people is puzzled - a murder has happened. The first ever one.

title: The Devil's Child
description: The arrival of a newborn girl causes the gradual disintegration of the Cairn family; particularly for 9-year-old Joshua (Kogan), an eccentric boy whose proper upbringing and refined tastes both take a sinister turn.

title: Samrat Prithviraj
description: A fearless warrior. An epic love story. Witness the grand saga of Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan.

title: The Clearing
description: As an executive is held captive by a former employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.

title: Song One
description: A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.

title: Wilson
description: A lonely, neurotic, and hilariously honest middle-aged man reunites with his estranged wife, and meets his teenage daughter for the first time.

title: Empire of the Wolves
description: A disgraced policeman helps a young detective to hunt down a serial killer who targets Turkish women in Paris.

title: A Fantastic Fear of Everything
description: A crime novelist whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck must confront his worst fears when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

title: Jagame Thandhiram
description: A nomadic gangster finds himself caught between good and evil in a fight for a place to call home. Starring Dhanush, Aishwarya Lekshmi and James Cosmo.

title: Interview with a Hitman
description: An elite hitman returns to erase his past only to find that somebody has messed with his future.

title: Khatta Meetha
description: A seemingly corrupt petty contractor faces challenges from the local municipality, his family, his employees, as well as a former girlfriend and her family.

title: Rowdy Rathore
description: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the small-town locals and the little girl who insists she's his daughter, from the mob.

title: Partner
description: A 'Love Guru' assists other males, woos a widowed single mother, but becomes embroiled in controversies.

title: Bairavaa
description: Bairavaa, a gallant debt collector, takes on a violent criminal masquerading as a philanthropist in the education field.

title: White Noise
description: Dramatizes a contemporary American family's attempts to deal with the mundane conflicts of everyday life while grappling with the universal mysteries of love, death, and the possibility of happiness in an uncertain world.

title: White Chicks
description: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson sisters from a kidnapping plot.

title: Coyote Ugly
description: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

title: Enough
description: After running away fails, a terrified woman empowers herself in order to battle her abusive husband.

title: The Matrix Resurrections
description: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it. To find out if his reality is a construct, to truly know himself, Mr. Anderson will have to choose to follow the white rabbit once more.

title: Memory
description: An assassin-for-hire finds that he's become a target after he refuses to complete a job for a dangerous criminal organization.

title: Not Another Teen Movie
description: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

title: Army of the Dead
description: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

title: Samaritan
description: A young boy learns that a superhero who was thought to have died after an epic battle twenty-five years ago may in fact still be alive.

title: Valentine's Day
description: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

title: Mulan
description: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father.

title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix
description: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix, causing the X-Men to decide if her life is worth more than all of humanity.

title: The Rental
description: Two couples rent a vacation home for what should be a celebratory weekend get-away.

title: Gamer
description: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment. Convict Kable, controlled by Simon, a skilled teenage gamer, must survive thirty sessions in order to be set free.

title: Bloodshot
description: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

title: Planet of the Apes
description: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

title: Fool's Gold
description: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

title: The Wrong Missy
description: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
description: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
description: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

title: The Purge
description: A wealthy family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legal.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: The hot-headed young D'Artagnan along with three former legendary but now down-on-their-luck Musketeers must unite and defeat a beautiful double agent and her villainous employer from seizing the French throne and engulfing Europe in war.

title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
description: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

title: Wild Mountain Thyme
description: A pair of star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute.

title: The Nutty Professor
description: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: Cry Macho
description: A one-time rodeo star and washed-up horse breeder takes a job to bring a man's young son home and away from his alcoholic mom. On their journey, the horseman finds redemption through teaching the boy what it means to be a good man.

title: Allegiant
description: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

title: Chaos Walking
description: Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.

title: Yes Day
description: A mom and dad who usually say no decide to say yes to their kids' wildest requests with a few ground rules on a whirlwind day of fun and adventure.

title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
description: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters, to find the mythical Golden Fleece, all the while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

title: Escape Room 2
description: Six people unwillingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover they've all played the game before.

title: Uncle Drew
description: An anti-ageist comedy about a man's dream to win the Rucker Classic street ball tournament in Harlem.

title: Fantastic Four
description: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

title: Pan
description: Twelve-year-old orphan Peter is spirited away to the magical world of Neverland, where he finds both fun and danger, and ultimately discovers his destiny: to become the hero who will be forever known as Peter Pan.

title: Antiviral
description: In a blackly satirical near future, a thriving industry sells celebrity illnesses to their obsessed fans. Employee Syd March's attempts to exploit the system backfire when they involve him in a potentially deadly mystery.

title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
description: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

title: Security
description: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

title: Sex and the City
description: A New York City writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

title: Windfall
description: A man breaks into a tech billionaire's empty vacation home, but things go sideways when the arrogant mogul and his wife arrive for a last-minute getaway.

title: Studio 666
description: Legendary rock band Foo Fighters move into an Encino mansion steeped in grisly rock and roll history to record their much anticipated 10th album.

title: Silent Night
description: Nell, Simon, and their son Art are ready to welcome friends and family for what promises to be a perfect Christmas gathering. Perfect except for one thing: everyone is going to die.
A man's life is derailed when an ominous pattern of events repeats itself in exactly the same manner every day, ending at precisely 2:22 p.m.

title: The Watch
description: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

title: Identity Thief
description: Mild mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

title: Chicken Little
description: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

title: 101 Dalmatians
description: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat but creates an extravagant mess instead.

title: The Marksman
description: A rancher on the Arizona border becomes the unlikely defender of a young Mexican boy desperately fleeing the cartel assassins who've pursued him into the U.S.

title: Velvet Buzzsaw
description: A thriller about the contemporary art scene of Los Angeles, where big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce.

title: Night Teeth
description: A college student moonlighting as a chauffeur picks up two mysterious women for a night of party-hopping across LA. But when he uncovers their bloodthirsty intentions - and their dangerous, shadowy underworld - he must fight to stay alive.

title: Crocodile Dundee II
description: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

title: Freddy vs. Jason
description: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.

title: Beethoven
description: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

title: John Tucker Must Die
description: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

title: The Darkest Minds
description: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

title: Only God Forgives
description: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.

title: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
description: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

title: Mechanic: Resurrection
description: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

title: I Spit on Your Grave 2
description: When Katie innocently accepts an offer to have new photos taken for her portfolio, the experience quickly turns into a nightmare of rape, torture and kidnapping. Now, she will have to find the strength to exact her brutal revenge.

title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
description: Follows the lives of five interconnected couples as they experience the thrills and surprises of having a baby and realize that no matter what you plan for, life does not always deliver what is expected.

title: Close
description: A female bodyguard is hired to protect an heiress on the run from assassins.

title: Escape from L.A.
description: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

title: Good Burger
description: A dim-witted teenager and his new coworker try to save the old burger joint they work for from failing after the opening of a brand new burger restaurant across the street, which's planning to put them out of business.

title: The Do-Over
description: Two down-on-their-luck guys decide to fake their own deaths and start over with new identities, only to find the people they're pretending to be are in even deeper trouble.

title: Gemini Man
description: An over-the-hill hitman faces off against a younger clone of himself.

title: The Domestics
description: In the weeks following an apocalyptic event, a husband and wife venture across the countryside inhabited by deadly factions in search of safety, and must work together as they are pushed to the breaking point in order to survive.

title: Jigsaw
description: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

title: Bad Neighbours 2
description: When their new next-door neighbors turn out to be a sorority even more debaucherous than the fraternity that lived there before, Mac and Kelly team with their former enemy, Teddy, to bring the girls down.

title: Underworld: Blood Wars
description: Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

title: Honeymoon
description: A newlywed couple finds their lake-country honeymoon descend into chaos after Paul finds Bea wandering and disoriented in the middle of the night.

title: The Factory
description: An obsessed cop is on the trail of a serial killer prowling the streets of Buffalo, N.Y. but when his teenage daughter disappears, he drops any professional restraint to get the killer.

title: The Sleepover
description: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

title: Pet Sematary
description: Dr. Louis Creed and his wife, Rachel, relocate from Boston to rural Maine with their two young children. The couple soon discover a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near their new home.

title: The Keep
description: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

title: Sabotage
description: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

title: Hitman: Agent 47
description: An assassin teams up with a woman to help her find her father and uncover the mysteries of her ancestry.

title: Little Italy
description: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.

title: Poseidon
description: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
description: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

title: Child's Play
description: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.

title: Planes
description: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

title: Return of the Living Dead: Part II
description: Curious kids unearth the barrels that previously helped revive the dead, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

title: Almost Heroes
description: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

title: Battle Los Angeles
description: A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.

title: Ben-Hur
description: Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince falsely accused of treason by his adopted brother, an officer in the Roman army, returns to his homeland after years at sea to seek revenge, but finds redemption.

title: Savage Grace
description: A dramatization of the shocking Barbara Daly Baekeland murder case, which happened in a posh London flat on Friday 17 November 1972. The bloody crime caused a stir on both sides of the Atlantic and remains one of the most memorable American Tragedies...

title: Cutthroat Island
description: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

title: Flowers in the Attic
description: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

title: Cooties
description: A mysterious virus hits an isolated elementary school, transforming the kids into a feral swarm of mass savages. An unlikely hero must lead a motley band of teachers in the fight of their lives.

title: Blue Crush
description: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

title: The Paramedic
description: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

title: Little Evil
description: Gary, who has just married Samantha, the woman of his dreams, discovers that her six-year-old son may be the Antichrist.

title: Insidious: The Last Key
description: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home where the terror began.

title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
description: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

title: Michael
description: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

title: The Postcard Killings
description: A New York detective investigates the death of his daughter who was murdered while on her honeymoon in London; he recruits the help of a Scandinavian journalist when other couples throughout Europe suffer a similar fate.

title: Drive Me Crazy
description: Nicole and Chase used to be BFFs, then junior high happened. The high school centennial dance is coming but Nicole gets dumped. So does Chase. They stage a relationship to get at their exes. They visit each other's worlds. Love in the air?

title: The Dyatlov Pass Incident
description: A group of students go to the location of the infamous Dyatlov pass incident to make a documentary, but things take a turn for the worse as the secret of what happened there is revealed.

title: Perfect Stranger
description: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

title: The Paperboy
description: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

title: Wrath of the Titans
description: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

title: An American Pickle
description: An immigrant worker at a pickle factory is accidentally preserved for 100 years and wakes up in modern-day Brooklyn.

title: Would You Rather
description: Desperate to help her ailing brother, a young woman unknowingly agrees to compete in a deadly game of "Would You Rather," hosted by a sadistic aristocrat.

title: In the Blood
description: When her husband goes missing during their Caribbean vacation, a woman sets off on her own to take down the men she thinks are responsible.

title: You Again
description: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

title: Reasonable Doubt
description: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when he's involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

title: Acts of Vengeance
description: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

title: Priest
description: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.

title: Hudson Hawk
description: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

title: Death at a Funeral
description: A funeral ceremony turns into a debacle of exposed family secrets and misplaced bodies.

title: Bandidas
description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

title: A Classic Horror Story
description: In this gruesome suspense film, strangers traveling in southern Italy become stranded in the woods, where they must fight desperately to get out alive.

title: Race to Witch Mountain
description: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

title: Bubble Boy
description: Bubble Boy's been in a bubble all his life due to no immune system. A cute blonde girl befriends BB. Her boyfriend proposes and BB decides to travel across USA to Niagara Falls to stop the wedding.

title: The Kissing Booth 2
description: In the sequel to 2018's THE KISSING BOOTH, high school senior Elle juggles a long-distance relationship with her dreamy boyfriend Noah, college applications, and a new friendship with a handsome classmate that could change everything.

title: Afternoon Delight
description: Rachel tries to spice up her marriage with a trip to a strip club. She befriends McKenna who gave her a lapdance. She moves in with Rachel's family and becomes a nanny for the son.

title: Paranormal Activity 2
description: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.

title: Rubber
description: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.

title: Beckett
description: Following a tragic car accident in Greece, an American tourist finds himself at the center of a dangerous political conspiracy and on the run for his life.

title: Aftermath
description: Two strangers' lives become inextricably bound together after a devastating plane crash.

title: The Lady of Heaven
description: Two stories separated by 1400 years. After losing his mother in the midst of a war-torn country, an Iraqi child, learns the importance and power of patience by discovering the historical story of Lady Fatima and her suffering.

title: Get Over It
description: A high school senior's girlfriend breaks up with him. His friends try to make him think of something else. His friend's sister Kelly helps him with the school musical. Spending time with Kelly has an effect.

title: Queen of the Desert
description: A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.

title: Grace of Monaco
description: The story of former Hollywood star Grace Kelly's crisis of marriage and identity, during a political dispute between Monaco's Prince Rainier III and France's Charles De Gaulle, and a looming French invasion of Monaco in the early 1960s.

title: The Little Vampire
description: A lonely American boy living in Scotland makes a new best friend, a fellow nine year-old who happens to be a vampire.

title: Money Train
description: A vengeful New York City transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares. His foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

title: Cuttputli
description: When a small town gets plunged into the nightmare of serial killings, rookie cop Arjan embarks on a chase for the truth and unravels a gruesome conspiracy.

title: White Girl
description: Summer, New York City. A college girl falls hard for a guy she just met. After a night of partying goes wrong, she goes to wild extremes to get him back.

title: Jingle All The Way
description: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

title: I Think We're Alone Now
description: The apocalypse proves a blessing in disguise for one lucky recluse -- until a second survivor arrives with the threat of companionship.

title: The Vanished
description: A husband and wife will stop at nothing to find their missing daughter, who disappeared on a family camping trip. When the police don't have any leads, the duo takes over.

title: The Descent: Part 2
description: Refusing to believe her story about cave-dwelling monsters, the sole survivor of a spelunking exploration gone horribly wrong is forced to follow the authorities back into the caves where something awaits.

title: Sugar & Spice
description: A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

title: SpaceCamp
description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

title: Clown
description: A loving father finds a clown suit for his son's birthday party, only to realize that it's cursed.

title: The Last Exorcism
description: A troubled evangelical minister agrees to let his last exorcism be filmed by a documentary crew.

title: Something to Talk About
description: A woman's world is rocked when she discovers her husband is cheating on her.

title: Texas Killing Fields
description: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

title: Premature
description: A high school senior has to re-live losing his virginity over and over again until he gets it right, with the right girl.

title: Rules Don't Apply
description: The unconventional love story of an aspiring actress, her ambitious driver, and their eccentric boss, the legendary billionaire Howard Hughes.

title: Mighty Joe Young
description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

title: Bullet to the Head
description: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington, D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

title: The Man Who Killed Hitler and Then the Bigfoot
description: A legendary American war veteran is recruited to hunt a mythical creature.

title: Drillbit Taylor
description: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

title: Pet
description: A man bumps into an old crush and holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works.

title: Four Christmases
description: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

title: Angel Eyes
description: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

title: Armed and Dangerous
description: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

title: Death Warrant
description: In a violent and corrupt prison, decorated cop Louis Burke must infiltrate the jail to find answers to a number of inside murders. What he finds is a struggle of life and death tied in to his own past.

title: The Santa Clause 2
description: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for eight years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

title: Diary of a Sex Addict
description: A chronicle of the life of a middle-class French girl's sexual adventures, her then fall into prostitution, and her ultimate redemption.

title: Playing for Keeps
description: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's football team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive football moms who pursue him at every turn.

title: I Give It a Year
description: Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?

title: Drowning Mona
description: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

title: Intruders
description: Anna suffers from agoraphobia so crippling that when a trio of criminals break into her house, she cannot bring herself to flee. But what the intruders don't realize is that agoraphobia is not her only problem.

title: Office Uprising
description: An employee at a weapons factory discovers that an energy drink turns his co-workers into zombies.

title: Orca
description: A hunter squares off against a killer whale seeking vengeance for the death of its mate.

title: America's Sweethearts
description: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

title: Point Blank
description: An ER nurse and a career criminal are forced into an unlikely partnership in taking down a ring of corrupt cops threatening the lives of both their families.

title: Airport 1975
description: A 747 in flight collides with a small plane, and is rendered pilotless. Somehow the control tower must get a pilot aboard so the jet can land.

title: Lessons in Love
description: A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.

title: Arthur
description: A drunken playboy stands to lose a wealthy inheritance when he falls for a woman his family doesn't like.

title: Think Like a Man Too
description: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

title: Love Potion No. 9
description: Two scientists who are hopeless with the opposite sex experiment with a substance that makes them irresistible to anyone who hears them speak.

title: Strange Magic
description: Goblins, elves, fairies and imps, and their misadventures sparked by the battle over a powerful potion.

title: Blue Steel
description: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.

title: Short Circuit 2
description: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

title: Sea Fever
description: The crew of a West of Ireland trawler, marooned at sea, struggle for their lives against a growing parasite in their water supply.

title: The Love Punch
description: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

title: The Preacher's Wife
description: An angel comes to Earth to help a preacher save his church and his family.

title: Admission
description: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.

title: How To Talk To Girls At Parties
description: An alien touring the galaxy breaks away from her group and meets two young inhabitants of the most dangerous place in the universe: the London borough of Croydon.

title: Observe and Report
description: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective is recruited to close the case.

title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
description: The owner of an historic South Side Chicago barbershop is pressured to sell out to a land developer, but must face the impact this would have on his close-knit community.

title: Gambit
description: An art curator decides to seek revenge on his abusive boss by conning him into buying a fake Monet, but his plan requires the help of an eccentric and unpredictable Texas rodeo queen.

title: Lost River
description: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.

title: The Bay
description: Chaos breaks out in a small Maryland town after an ecological disaster occurs.

title: Nowhere to Run
description: Sam, an escaped convict, lands up on a farmland owned by a widow. When he learns that a ruthless contractor is trying to take over her land, he helps her to fight against the injustice.

title: Blue Mountain State: The Rise of Thadland
description: When the Dean of Blue Mountain State threatens to sell the Goat House, Alex throws Thad the party of his dreams in an effort to get him to buy it.

title: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard
description: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

title: In Darkness
description: A blind musician hears a murder committed in the apartment upstairs from hers that sends her down a dark path into London's gritty criminal underworld.

title: The Hallow
description: A family who moved into a remote mill house in Ireland finds themselves in a fight for survival with demonic creatures living in the woods.

title: Last Days
description: A Seattle musician's life and career are reminiscent of those of Kurt Cobain.

title: Kaboom
description: A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his classmates -- with him at the center.

title: The Nut Job
description: An incorrigibly self-serving exiled squirrel finds himself helping his former park brethren survive by raiding a nut store, a location that also happens to be a front for a human gang's bank robbery.

title: Paparazzi
description: A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

title: The Gingerbread Man
description: A lawyer uses his power to help his lover put her father behind bars, but when he escapes, they are all in danger.

title: Son of God
description: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

title: The In-Laws
description: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

title: Ernest Scared Stupid
description: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

title: The Man with One Red Shoe
description: A man picked randomly out of a crowd is made the target of CIA survelliance and pursuit.

title: The English Teacher
description: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.

title: Stitches
description: A clown comes back from the dead to haunt those who took his life during a fatal party mishap.

title: Futureworld
description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

title: Kill Command
description: Set in a near future, technology-reliant society that pits man against killing machines.

title: We Are Still Here
description: In the cold, wintery fields of New England, a lonely old house wakes up every thirty years - and demands a sacrifice.

title: The Angriest Man in Brooklyn
description: A perpetually angry man is informed he has 90 minutes to live and promptly sets out to reconcile with his family and friends in the short time he has left.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2
description: When strangers Reet and Ruhan cross paths, their journey leads to an abandoned mansion and a dreaded spirit who has been trapped for 18 years.

title: Vampires vs. the Bronx
description: A group of young friends from the Bronx fight to save their neighborhood from gentrification...and vampires.

title: The Pact
description: As a woman struggles to come to grips with her past in the wake of her mother's death and the disappearance of her sister, an unsettling presence emerges in her childhood home.

title: Cadillac Man
description: Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.

title: The Hole
description: A pair of brothers stumble upon a mysterious hole in their basement that leads to the darkest corridors of their fears and nightmares.

title: Echelon Conspiracy
description: At first, the strange phone messages promised great wealth. Soon, though, government agents pursue the young engineer receiving them around the world.

title: Just Visiting
description: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

title: The Banger Sisters
description: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after twenty years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

title: King Kong vs. Godzilla
description: A UN reporter broadcasts a report on the appearance of a prehistoric monster that emerges from hibernation while a pharmaceutical company seeks publicity with a monster of their own. (US Version)

title: The Juror
description: A juror in a Mafia trial is forced to convince the other jurors to vote not guilty by an obsessive mob enforcer.

title: The Flock
description: A hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl whom he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

title: A Single Shot
description: The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.

title: Next Day Air
description: Two inept criminals are mistakenly delivered a package of cocaine and think they've hit the jackpot, triggering a series of events that changes 10 people's lives forever.

title: Girl Most Likely
description: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.

title: Earth to Echo
description: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

title: Armoured
description: A newbie guard for an armored truck company is coerced by his veteran coworkers to steal a truck containing $42 million. But a wrinkle in their supposedly foolproof plan divides the group, leading to a potentially deadly resolution.

title: The Art of War

description: To be the CEO, an heiress is challenged by her dad to deliver a Christmas letter in person to his ex-partner in their hometown - traveling by bus, incognito and with only $100. Will she learn something from the people there?

title: Ernest Saves Christmas
description: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

title: The Muse
description: With his career on the skids, a Hollywood screenwriter enlists the aid of a modern-day muse, who proves to test his patience.

title: Five Minarets in New York
description: In Istanbul, terrorists abduct executives, blow-up the car of a journalist and plan five great attacks to the city. The violent police officer Firat Baran interrogates a terrorist and ... See full summary »

description: The story of the film is based on real events of financial market that took place between 1990 and 2000 involving Harshad Mehta and his financial crimes.

description: Following the loss of his family, a man attempts suicide only to discover upon waking that he can identify people who are about to die

description: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

description: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves his house, fortune, and his prized collection of ghosts.

title: The Pink Panther

description: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

description: This is the story of Shiva who sets out in search of love and self-discovery. During his journey, he has to face many evil forces that threaten our existence.

description: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

description: One year after their first adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and they set out to discover its secrets.

description: Sam Reide uses his power to time travel to solve the mystery of his girlfriend's death.

title: The Specialist
description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

title: The House

description: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.

description: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

description: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

description: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

title: The Box
description: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

title: The Pink Panther 2

description: Two young friends find a magic book that brings a ventriloquist's dummy to life.

title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
description: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

description: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

description: Two inseparable, hormonal, English BFF teen boys, avoided by all others, head to Ibiza with Kevin's parents. Will they lose their virginity there?

title: The Punisher
description: When Frank Castle's family is murdered by criminals, he wages war on crime as a vigilante assassin known only as The Punisher.

title: Dahmer
description: Biopic about notorious American serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer, taking place in both the past and the present.

title: Village of the Damned
description: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

title: Spinning Man
description: A happily married professor, known for having many affairs with students, becomes the prime suspect when a young woman has gone missing.

title: The Bonfire of the Vanities
description: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracts the interest of a down-and-out reporter.

description: Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by an ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.

title: Hick
description: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.

title: Monster Trucks
description: A young man working at a small town junkyard discovers and befriends a creature which feeds on oil being sought by a fracking company.

title: Chopping Mall
description: A group of young shopping mall employees stay behind for a late night party in one of the stores. When the mall goes on lock-down before they can get out, the robot security system malfunctions, and goes on a killing spree.

title: The Intruder

title: Altered
description: Fifteen years ago, a group of men's lives were forever changed by a strange occurrence. Now, the same group of men will spend a night together ... in terror.

title: Stalingrad

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream Master
